# Discrete Transistor Driver

This document will explore making logic gates with discrete transistors.

[This video](https://youtu.be/sTu3LwpF6XI) by Ben Eater shows some basic ways to make gates.

[This Video](https://youtu.be/nB6724G3b3E) shows some more advanced gates.

[Here is a Falstad
